title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, 100% of both male and female populations in Saudi Arabia were using the internet, showcasing complete digital connectivity.

title: Minimal Use of Combustible Renewables
description: In 2022, only 0.003% of Saudi Arabia's total energy consumption came from combustible renewables and waste, indicating a reliance on other energy sources.

title: High Losses from Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2022, Saudi Arabian firms reported losses amounting to 61.9% of their annual sales due to theft and vandalism, highlighting significant security challenges.

title: Limited Formal Training in Firms
description: As of 2022, only 3.9% of firms in Saudi Arabia offered formal training, suggesting a potential area for development in workforce skills enhancement.
